alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 6:05PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Bay, southern Walton and southern Washington Counties through 700 PM EDT/600 PM CDT/... At 605 PM EDT/505 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles southeast of De Funiak Springs, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Santa Rosa Beach, Springfield, Hiland Park, Eglin Air Force Base, Tyndall Air Force Base, Live Oak, Freeport, Ebro, Villa Tasso, Dirego Park, College Station, Gulf Resort Beach, Blue Mountain Beach, West Panama City, Seaside, Bahama Beach and Rock Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; South Walton; Washington
